data.text:
Our stay at Hotel Rialto in Barcelona was outstanding.  In particular Alex Sanchez was very professional and made sure our family visited the right places.  Alex recommended excellent restaurants and gave us safety tips to ensure we visited the right places at the right time.  Alex was also very caring and insightful when recommending taxi service and pharmacy care. 

Our family highly recommends Hotel Rialto in Barcelona and meeting Alex Sanchez is a must.  The Rialto has an exceptional breakfast for guest which includes unlimited Cava.  An amazing experience!!
data.title: A Great Experience during our Barcelona Visit.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Peter,

We appreciate your time and your feedback; everything helps us to improve. Regarding the staff, we are pleased to read this, as we are all very committed to doing good work and providing excellent service to our guests. We will pass on your congratulations to our colleagues.

Anna R.
Customer Service
owner_response.author: Carmen M Customer Service

data.text:
Great location, very close to Las ramblas and other tourist attractions, all in walking distance. Also about a 2 min walk to a courtyard full of great restaurants. 
The hotel was clean and the staff were incredibly friendly and helpful even after arriving very late into the night. The room itself was great for the price, comfortable bed, big shower and very clean throughout. The breakfast had a massive selection and the food was very good and a great price. The only issue we had was that the air conditioning in the room did not go below 19°c which made it extremely warm in the room, at one point the temperature read 29°c. We asked at reception and were told that it was set at that level and could not be changed until the summer season started. We kept the windows open which helped a little but still found it quite warm. Overall though it was a great hotel with many good qualities, I would definitely recommend and stay again.
data.title: Great location, with many good qualities

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear ceris
We appreciate your time in sharing your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience with the air conditioning. It is centralized and activates automatically with the change of season. Considering the unusually high temperatures in recent days, it may have felt warmer than usual for this time of year. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotels. Anna R. Customer services.
owner_response.author: Carmen M Customer Service

data.text:
Very central hotel, based in the Gothic Quarter. Rooms are very clean, staff friendly! Within walking distance to metro and lots of nice restaurants!
We walked to Barceloneta Beach area and the marina within 20 mins of the hotel. Lots of nice restaurants and bars in this area also.
data.title: Hotel Rialto

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Jhealy
Thank you very much for taking the time to share your opinion with us. We are delighted to know that we have contributed to making your trip an unforgettable experience.

Anna R.
Customer Service
owner_response.author: Carmen M Customer Service

data.text: From setting foot in the hotel we were made super welcome. Nothing was too much for the management and staff. Very quick check in and case taken to the room. Everything is clean and room was small but had everything we needed. Breakfast takes this hotel to another level. You go downstairs under the hotel where all the walls are brick with arched roofs, giving the whole place an exciting underground feeling. The food is plentiful with an excellent choice.The hotel is also in a fantastic position for  La Rambla. We look forward to returning later in the year. Thank you for making our stay stress free.
data.title: Excellent hotel, look forward to another stay.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
DearAndy

We are delighted to hear about your experience at our hotel. We appreciate your positive feedback and are pleased to have provided you with a satisfactory stay. We always strive to deliver excellent service and a memorable experience to our guests. We look forward to seeing you again in the future and surpassing your expectations once more.

Best regards,
Anna R.
Customer Service
owner_response.author: Carmen M Customer Service

data.text: My daughter and I stayed here for 3 nights.  The hotel is in a fantastic location and it was easy to find.  The hotel staff was super helpful and even helped us buy tickets for excursions! We were also very happy with the breakfast. It was an additional charge but it was a buffet and it was well worth the price!! The only down side would be that we couldn’t control the room temperature and it was warm in the room so we had to keep the window open all of the time. We definitely recommend this hotel!
data.title: Wonderful hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Letsflyawaysomeday

We are delighted that you have chosen our hotel and that you have had such a positive experience. We strive to make our customers happy, and our greatest satisfaction is knowing that we have achieved our goal. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotels in the near future.

Anna R.
Customer Service
owner_response.author: Carmen M Customer Service
